SEARCH
Package view

Class PatientView

Object
PatientView
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
public class PatientView extends Object implements View
Represents the patient view in the Hospital Management System (HMS). This class implements the View interface Provides methods for managing appointments, updating personal information, and viewing medical records.
Since:
2024-10-27
Version:
19.9
Author:
Chin Linn Sheng

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientView

      public PatientView()
      Constructs a PatientView instance.

  • Method Details

    • handleUpdatePersonalInfo

      public static void handleUpdatePersonalInfo()
      Updates the personal information of the current patient. Prompts user for the latest phone number and email address.

    • handleViewAvailableAppointmentSlots

      public static void handleViewAvailableAppointmentSlots()
      Displays the available appointment slots for doctors.

    • handleScheduleAnAppointment

      public static void handleScheduleAnAppointment()
      Schedules an appointment with a doctor. The method first displays the available appointment slots, then prompts the user to enter the doctor's name, date, and time slot. If the entered information is valid, the appointment is scheduled.

    • handleCancelAppointment

      public static void handleCancelAppointment()
      Cancels an existing appointment for the current patient. The method first displays the patient's scheduled appointments, then prompts the user for the appointment ID to cancel.

    • handleRescheduleAppointment

      public static void handleRescheduleAppointment()
      Reschedules an existing appointment for the current patient. The method first displays the patient's scheduled appointments, then prompts the user to enter the appointment ID to be rescheduled. The method then displays the available appointment slots and prompts the user to enter a new date and time slot. Validates Appointment ID, time slot and date before proceeding.

    • handleViewPatientScheduledAppointment

      public static void handleViewPatientScheduledAppointment()
      Displays the scheduled appointments for the current patient.

    • handleViewPastAppointmentRecords

      public static void handleViewPastAppointmentRecords()
      Displays past appointment outcomes for the current patient from database. If no records are available, notifies the user.

    • printViewMenu

      public void printViewMenu()
      Prints the menu options for the patient view.
      Specified by:
      printViewMenu in interface View

    • handleView

      public void handleView()
      Handles user input and interactions for the patient view. Processes the selected menu option.
      Specified by:
      handleView in interface View

    • viewTitle

      public void viewTitle()
      Prints the title for the patient view.
      Specified by:
      viewTitle in interface View
